trans-unit.source: Exposes <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup"></xref> types to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 노출 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup"> </xref> 유형를 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The element associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: 이 자동화 피어와 연결 된 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: The automation peer that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab"></xref> that holds the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 자동화 피어와 연결 된는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab"> </xref> 보유 하는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 컨트롤 형식을 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup"> </xref> 이와 연결 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>

trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"> </xref> 열거형 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the class name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 클래스 이름을 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup"> </xref> 이와 연결 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>

trans-unit.source: The class name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 클래스 이름에서 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup"> </xref> 이와 연결 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤 패턴을 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup"> </xref> 연관 된는 <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: A value enumeration that specifies the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤 패턴을 지정 하는 값 열거형입니다.

trans-unit.source: An object that supports the control pattern if patternInterface is the , , , or value; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 경우 컨트롤 패턴을 지원 하는 개체 patternInterface 는 , , , 또는 값입니다; 그렇지 않으면 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Hides all controls that are in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 에 있는 모든 컨트롤을 숨기는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 명시적 인터페이스 멤버 구현 이며

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: 사용할 수 있습니다 경우에만 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer>인스턴스로 캐스팅 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider>인터페이스.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: Shows the controls that are in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤에 있는 표시 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 명시적 인터페이스 멤버 구현 이며

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: 사용할 수 있습니다 경우에만 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer>인스턴스로 캐스팅 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider>인터페이스.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: Gets the state, expanded or collapsed, of the control that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: , 확장 또는 축소 상태, 연결 된 컨트롤의 가져옵니다 <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 명시적 인터페이스 멤버 구현 이며

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: 사용할 수 있습니다 경우에만 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer>인스턴스로 캐스팅 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider>인터페이스.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: The state of the control that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 과 관련 된 컨트롤의 상태 <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup"></xref> into the visible region of the container.
trans-unit.target: 스크롤은 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup"> </xref> 컨테이너의 표시 영역에 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 명시적 인터페이스 멤버 구현 이며

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollItemProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: 사용할 수 있습니다 경우에만 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer>인스턴스로 캐스팅 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollItemProvider>인터페이스.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollItemProvider> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer>
